summary: SummaryMediheal Retinol Collagen Eye Ampoule Patch smooths the look of fine lines and helps restore a youthful resilience around the eyes. This hydrogel patch feels cooling and leaves the delicate area firmer and more supple.
details: DetailsBenefitsBoosts elasticity and plumps delicate eye-area skinSmooths texture for a firmer, more lifted lookHelps reduce puffiness and fine linesKey IngredientsRetinol Liposomes: promote skin renewal, improve firmness, and reduce visible wrinkles5 Collagen Types: restore elasticity and plumpness around the eyesGlutathione & Niacinamide: brighten skin tone and help fade dark spotsResearch ResultsEffective in reducing fine lines and deep wrinkles around the eyes.36.71% improvement in eye and under-eye (eye bag) volume.Dual-action formula: Brightening and visibly firms.Item 2640450How To UseAfter cleansing and toning unfold a patch using the built-in spatula. Apply patches under each eye and leave them for 20-30 minutes. Remove patches and gently pat remaining essence into the skin.Tip: Patches can be applied onto different areas of the face. (mouth lines, forehead, neck)IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Trehalose, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Glucomannan, Retinol, Collagen, Hydrolyzed Extensin, Collagen Extract, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Soluble Collagen, Glutathione, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside,Phaseolus Radiatus Seed Extract, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, CI 77491, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Ethyl Hexanediol, Hexylene Glycol, Allantoin, Calcium Chloride, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Panthenol, Sucrose, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Calcium Lactate, Cellulose Gum, Adenosine, Potassium Chloride, Arginine, Gellan Gum, RicinusCommunis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance.
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning unfold a patch using the built-in spatula. Apply patches under each eye and leave them for 20-30 minutes. Remove patches and gently pat remaining essence into the skin.Tip: Patches can be applied onto different areas of the face. (mouth lines, forehead, neck)
